verses.name: Ephesians 5:23
verses.text: For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.

verses.name: Ephesians 5:24
verses.text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing.

verses.name: Ephesians 5:25
verses.text: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;

verses.name: Ephesians 5:26
verses.text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,
